title: Streamlining Paper Selection
description: Developed and validated a large language model pipeline to automate systematic review screening, achieving 96% accuracy across 3,800+ citations and reducing manual review time by an estimated 400+ hours.

title: Inventory Management Case Study
description: Built a comprehensive inventory analytics dashboard for a nonprofit medical device organization, uncovering supply chain inefficiencies and informing redistribution strategy across partner sites.

title: Population Health Leaders
description: Engineered an automated web scraping pipeline to identify and catalog population health decision-makers across U.S. hospital systems, building a structured database for targeted outreach.
